name: The Jazzorcist: D.S. al Coda
description:
SPECIAL THANKS TO AETHER S. FOR MAKING THE AUDIO

The Jazzorcist is the bee's knees when it comes to exorcisms. With the help of his trusty saxophone, he can expel just about any kind of unsavory creature from its unfortunate host.

But this time, he's bitten off more than he can chew.

A particularly nasty spirit has taken hold of one of the churchgoers, and won't go down without a fight. To make matters worse, everything seems to be going wrong for the Jazzorcist. Almost as if something  (or someone) is conspiring against him.

Oh, he's also stuck in a time loop, giving him two options: 

     1. Find a way to escape.

     2. Face the music and be trapped for all eternity.

HOW TO PLAY:

(Right click to cycle through controls)

(Moving mouse to the top of the screen reveals these options as well)

Movement: Left click with shoe icon

Interact/Pick up: Left click with hand icon

Talk: Left click with speech bubble icon

Inventory: Move mouse to top of the screen and left click briefcase icon

Using items: Left click item from inventory, then press the close button.

Left click on the item or person you want to use the item on.
